# fees

Fees on a certain date of top crypto protocols

### Usage

```python wordwrap
/crypto fees date
```

---

## Parameters

| Name | Description | Optional | Choices |
| ---- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| date | Date to get fees for (e.g., 2022-01-01) | False | None |


---

## Examples

```
/crypto fees date: 2022-09-19
```

---
